text: Eghtɨ amizir pumuning uaning inigh maziaba rɨghɨrɨghtɨma, God tav inighɨva tav ategham.”17:35-36 Baibelɨn fofozir gumazir maba ghaze akar otevir mam uaghan kagh iti. Akar otevir kam kamakɨn, “Gumazir pumuning azenimɨn ikɨtɨ, God aningɨn tav inigh egha tav ategham.” Nɨ deragh foghsɨ, Matyu 24:40ɨn gan.
